item.title: Senate Stablecoin Drama Heats Up: GENIUS Act Faces Final Vote Amid Trump-Linked Controversy
item.description:
The U.S. Senate has advanced the GENIUS Act after a 68-30 cloture vote, opening the path for Monday final consideration of a bill mandating dollar reserves, annual audits for issuers above $50 billion and oversight of foreign stablecoins, amid debate over Trump’s growing crypto ties.

The post Senate Stablecoin Drama Heats Up: GENIUS Act Faces Final Vote Amid Trump-Linked Controversy appeared first on Cryptonews.
